ownerships.owner: The Trump Equitable Fifth Avenue Company

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president of Fifty Seventh Street Associates LLC, of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned Over $5,000,000 in rent income from Fifty-Seventh Street Associates LLC, valued at Over $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: commercial real estate. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
